learn.lesson.welcome: Welcome to your interactive drawing lesson! Follow along with the guided instructions and practice your drawing skills.
learn.mode.title: Choose Your Learning Path
learn.mode.subtitle: How would you like to learn drawing today?
learn.mode.interactive.title: Interactive Lesson
learn.mode.interactive.desc: Jump right into drawing with real-time guidance, instant feedback, and adaptive hints. Perfect for hands-on learners who want to start creating immediately.
learn.mode.interactive.point2: Smart hints when you need help
learn.mode.tutorial.title: Step-by-Step Tutorial
learn.mode.tutorial.desc: Learn through structured lessons with detailed explanations, theory, and practice. Ideal for building strong fundamentals and understanding the why behind techniques.
learn.mode.footerNote: Your choice will be remembered for next time. You can always change it later in settings.
error.auth.magicLinkFailed: Failed to send magic link. Please try again.
auth.parentEmailHint: We'll send a verification link to this email
home.features.title: Everything you need to learn drawing
home.features.subtitle: From basic shapes to complex illustrations, our comprehensive platform guides you through every step of your artistic journey.
home.features.card.lessons.title: Interactive Lessons
home.features.card.lessons.desc: Step-by-step tutorials that adapt to your skill level, with real-time feedback and progress tracking.
home.features.card.canvas.title: Digital Canvas
home.features.card.canvas.desc: Professional drawing tools with layers, brushes, and colors. Practice directly in your browser with our advanced canvas.
home.features.card.coloring.title: Coloring Pages
home.features.card.coloring.desc: Beautiful, detailed coloring pages that complement your learning. Relax and practice color theory with stunning artwork.
home.cta.title: Ready to start your artistic journey?
home.cta.subtitle: Join thousands of artists who are already improving their skills with LucidCraft.
settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Choose your theme preference.
settings.appearance.title: Appearance
settings.appearance.desc: Switch between light and dark themes. System follows your OS setting.
settings.preview.heading: Heading contrast
settings.preview.body: Body text should be readable against the background.

home.guestDialog.description: Continue as a guest to try the canvas, or sign in to save progress.
